scripts.jquery-external: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run jquery-external && cd ../..
scripts.jquery-bundled: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run jquery-bundled && cd ../..
scripts.es1x: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run es1x && cd ../..
scripts.es-external: cd vendor/edges2 && npm run es-external dependencies/es.js && cd ../..
scripts.serve-g001: npm run jquery-bundled && npm run es1x && parcel serve views/g001.html -p 8000
scripts.build-g001: npm run jquery-bundled && npm run es1x && npm run clean && npm run target-g001
